# KromNhom Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-26

## Active Technologies

- Vue 3 with TypeScript frontend, .NET 8 Web API backend + Vue 3, TypeScript, DaisyUI, .NET 8, Dapper ORM (001-team-goal-tracker)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

Vue 3 with TypeScript frontend, .NET 8 Web API backend: Follow standard conventions

### Constitution Compliance

All code must adhere to KromNhom Constitution principles:
- KISS: Use simplest solution that works
- SOLID: Single responsibility, Open/closed, Dependency inversion
- Modular: Clear boundaries, minimal coupling, interface-based design

## Recent Changes

- 001-team-goal-tracker: Added Vue 3 with TypeScript frontend, .NET 8 Web API backend + Vue 3, TypeScript, DaisyUI, .NET 8, Dapper ORM
